whatIs.title: What is Steal a Brainrot?
whatIs.description: Steal a Brainrot is a fun, chaotic, and unique fast-paced game on Roblox where players compete to steal a valuable object called "Brainrot" from each other while protecting their own.
whatIs.rules: The rules are simple: grab as many brainrots as you can, use power-ups strategically, and overcome your opponents to climb the leaderboards. This game is perfect for quick matches with friends or random players online, offering infinite fun and unpredictable moments.
whatIs.conclusion: Its simple premise makes the Steal a Brainrot experience accessible to everyone, and our assistance tool is here to guide you.

fastPaced.title: Fast-Paced Game
fastPaced.description: Quick and energetic matches, every moment is full of energy

simpleControls.description: Easy to learn - just run, grab, and dodge

howToPlay.title: How to Play Steal a Brainrot

objective.title: Game Objective
objective.description: The objective is simple: steal as many brainrots as possible while protecting your own! Success requires a combination of speed, strategy, and a bit of luck.

controls.title: Basic Controls
controls.movementDesc: Use WASD or arrow keys to navigate the map
controls.jumpDesc: Press the spacebar to jump over obstacles and evade opponents
controls.stealDesc: Approach other players and use the interaction key to grab their brainrot
controls.powerupsDesc: Activate special items to gain strategic advantages

speed.title: Speed Boost
speed.description: Temporarily increases your movement speed, perfect for chasing or escaping

invisibility.title: Invisibility
invisibility.description: Become invisible for a short time to sneak up on opponents or hide your brainrot

fake.title: Fake Brainrot
fake.description: Place decoys to deceive your rivals, a smart tactic in any strategy

protect.question: How do I protect my Brainrot?
protect.answer: The best way is to stay in motion, use power-ups defensively, and know the map. A player who moves constantly and is aware of their surroundings is much harder to attack.

codes.question: Are there codes or rewards in the game?
codes.answer: Currently there are no active promotional codes. Developers may release codes during special events, so make sure to follow the official game announcements.

improve.question: How can I improve at the game?
improve.answer: Practice is key! Focus on mastering movement, learning map layouts, and understanding when to use power-ups.

rebirths.question: What are Rebirths?
rebirths.answer: Rebirths are a central mechanism for progressing in Steal a Brainrot. By sacrificing your current progress, you gain permanent improvements.

guides.title: Strategy Guides
guides.description: Complete guides from beginner to expert, to help you become a master of Steal a Brainrot
guides.step1Desc: Steal a Brainrot is a character collection and improvement game. Each character has different rarity levels and profits.
guides.step2Desc: It's recommended that beginners start with common characters like Sigma Boy or Alpha Male, which have low prices but stable profits.
guides.step3Desc: Based on your investment budget and time, choose the right combination of characters to maximize profits.

conservative.title: Conservative Strategy
conservative.description: Choose common characters with high profit/price ratio for stable growth

balanced.title: Balanced Strategy
balanced.description: Combine common and rare characters to balance risk and profits

aggressive.title: Aggressive Strategy
aggressive.description: Invest in high-rarity characters to maximize profits

scripts.whatAreScriptsDesc: Scripts are codes that can automate actions in the game or provide advantages.

autoFarm.title: Auto Farm
autoFarm.description: Automate resource collection and enemy fighting.

autoRebirth.title: Auto Rebirth
autoRebirth.description: Perform rebirth automatically when conditions are met.

teleport.title: Teleport
teleport.description: Instantly teleport to any location on the map.

scripts.risksDesc: Using scripts may violate game terms of service and result in account suspension. Use at your own risk.

instructions.step1: Download a script executor (like Synapse X or KRNL)
instructions.step2: Copy the script code you want to use
instructions.step3: Paste and execute the script in the game

segundoPiso.title: How to Reach the Second Floor
segundoPiso.subtitle: Master parkour skills on the downtown map and gain tactical advantage

step1.title: 1. Starting Location
step1.description: The starting point is located in the southwest corner of the Downtown map. Look for a small elevated platform near the main fountain.
step1.tip: 💡 Tip: Make sure there are no other players nearby before starting the parkour.

step2.title: 2. First Jump - Small Platform
step2.description: From the initial platform, jump to the right towards a small rectangular platform. This is the easiest jump but requires precision.

instructions.step3: Don't press the jump too hard

step3.title: 3. Second Jump - Medium Platform
step3.description: From the first platform, jump forward towards a larger platform. This jump requires more momentum.
step3.warning: ⚠️ Warning: If you fall here, you'll have to go back to the start.

step4.title: 4. Third Jump - The Challenge
step4.description: This is the most difficult jump. From the medium platform, you need to jump towards a higher and more distant platform.

step5.title: 5. Final Platform
step5.description: Once on the highest platform, jump to the right to reach the second floor. Congratulations! You've completed the parkour.
step5.reward: 🎉 Reward: From the second floor you have a strategic view of the map and access to exclusive power-ups.

timing.title: Perfect Timing
timing.description: Practice the timing of your jumps. A well-timed jump can save you valuable seconds.

powerups.title: Using Power-ups
powerups.description: Consider using speed power-ups before starting the parkour to make jumps easier.

rebirth.title: Ultimate Rebirth Guide
rebirth.subtitle: Understand the most important progression system, and why sacrificing current progress is key to becoming stronger
rebirth.whatIsRebirthDesc: Rebirth is a progression system that allows you to sacrifice your current progress to gain permanent bonuses.
rebirth.whenToRebirthDesc: It's recommended to rebirth when you've reached at least level 50 and have enough resources.

underground.description: A hidden passage that connects different areas of the map, perfect for quick escapes.

invisibility.description: Makes you completely invisible for 30 seconds, perfect for sneaking past enemies.

speedBoost.description: Increases your movement speed by 200% for 15 seconds, allowing you to outrun any opponent.

stealth.title: Stealth Approach
stealth.description: Use the environment to your advantage, hide in shadows and strike when least expected.

modificado.whatIsModifiedDesc: Modified versions are unofficial game modifications that add extra features and capabilities not available in the original game.
modificado.recommendationDesc: We strongly advise against using modified versions. The risks far outweigh any benefits, and you may lose your account permanently.
